vlive.korean: 내 주위를 지켜야 되는 착한 지령인 거야? Do you have to be around me? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.26 SSS #2 (SVT SECRET SANTA #2)
vlive.english: Do you have to be around me?

vlive.korean: 세상이 내 주위를 도는 건지 내가 세상 주위를 도는 건지~ The world revolves around me. I revolved around the world. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : Stray Kids(스트레이 키즈) "Astronaut" M/V MAKING FILM
vlive.english: The world revolves around me. I revolved around the world.
